channel.title: Natural Born Killers - A New Era
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i40.tinypic.com/x2tjz7.jpg[/img][/center]__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[u][b]Overview[/b][/u]
Hi everyone. I know you must be sick of seeing these development teams put together without an end result as am I. This is something I have been working on and off for the past year-ish and hosted it with no end result. I have changed my ways and decided to switch to an Emulous based source- Project Insanity. I have familiarized myself with the renamed client PI uses and explored everything server sided. The reasons I have chosen PI as a base:
• Excellent combat system • Pre made clan chat • Scratch skills which will be improved • Stable • Renamed client
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[u][b]Plans[/b][/u]
I have been working on the base for about 3 days now and I would like to put a team together so we can hopefully construct a decent private server together because I believe the more people working on it the better. My plans are as follows:
• Run the server and receive donations • Purchase a VPS (around 512mb to begin with) • Purchase an Invision Power Board from only $9.99 per month • Purchase a theme for the forum which has been already chosen out - [url=http://demo.skinground.com/venom.php]http://demo.skinground.com/venom.php[/url]
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[u][b]Progress/Updates[/b][/u]
This is the current updates and development which have been completed.
Updates: [b]8[/b]
• Changed layout of the server and moved home/pking spots to more conveniant places • Fixed the offer x amount dupe • Fixed the dueling dupe where if you logout during a duel the opposing player is forced to flee giving you the staked items. • Extended player save so when user logs out they don't rollback - Would annoy players tremendously • Ranked yelling system • Fixed the original godwars now has three bosses + minions and will be adding the fourth shortly • Fixed attack with magic out of wilderness, players now can only attack each other with magic in pvp zones • Very big thanks to Alex who is providing us with an IPB board, he will be the forums manager[center]
[b]Progress[/b]
[b]| | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | |[/b][/center] __________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b][u]Well Deserved Credits[/b]
• Sanity - For the server base, without him, I would've had to start from scratch with RiotScape • Phaze One - For editing & developing onto the base and improving Project Insanity • Alex - For providing an IPB 3.0 board, without him we would be on a crappy free forum __________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
If you are interested in joining in the development please fill out an application form.
[u][b]Application Form[/b][/u]
Your Name: Your Time Zone (GMT+/GMT-): How you wish to involve yourself: Experience: Why you would like to be part of the team: Your msn/contact information:
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b]Accepted Applications[/b] • Phaze One - Client Coder/Server Coder/Forums Manager/Owner • Alex - Webhoster/Forums Manager • Krackkid - Web Designer/Advertiser/Forums Moderator • jmood128 - Forums Moderator
[b]Pending Applications[/b]
[b]Denied Applications[/b] • pl0x15 __________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Thanks to everyone if you have read and I hope to see some good applicants.
- Tyler

item.title: Natural Born Killers - A New Era
item.dc:creator: @CookieScape CookieScape
item.description:
@CookieScape wrote:

Your Name: Travis Yates
Your Time Zone (GMT+/GMT-): Pacific GMT -8 I think?
How you wish to involve yourself: Web Developer/Web Designer/ Server Coder/Anything you need, I can do.
Experience: I’m currently working as an experienced programmer for an up and coming company called Techo, as well as for a seperate gaming company called JetFuel games. I have been staff on a lot of servers and I coded and hosted my own server a while back.
Why you would like to be part of the team: I like to help people, I’m a people person, I can provide a vBulletin forum.
Your msn/contact information: travisjyates@hotmail.com

This is the thing I use as my “Resumé” on most servers I apply for.

Hello, I’m Travis, . I’m from Washington and work at Safeway as well as programming for an online up and coming business called Techo. I’ve been playing, coding, and hosting 317 server’s for about 5 years, ever since the first RSPS, Moparscape came out. I think I could do very good and benefit the server/forums in the following ways.

  • I own, host, and code my very own server.
  • I am a moderator on a few different servers, as well as admin and coder on a few previously.
  • I can code Java, C++, PHP, MySQL, etc…
  • I can provide you guys with vBulletin forums free of charge.
  • I am very active and love people, and helping people.

If you have any questions, please contact me via responding to this thread, or by my MSN, travisjyates@hotmail.com

Thanks,

Travis.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“Amayzing, post:13, topic:340557”]Your Name: Alex

Your Time Zone (GMT+/GMT-): GMT-7

How you wish to involve yourself: I would like to help develop the forum seeing as I already have extensive web development experience as well as a standard IP.Board license that I purchased back in December. Even though it has expired, I’m free to use the software that remains on my computer, which is both versions 2.3.6 and 3.0.5. Once I get some more cash, I’ll renew my license which will allow me to download the newer versions and receive support once more.
Experience: I’ve been developing website for roughly two years. I know HTML and PHP well and I’m quickly trying to master MySQL in addition to some other more difficult languages.

Why you would like to be part of the team: My life consists of friends, family, basketball and the internet now that it’s summer, meaning I’ll be free to do anything I’d like to during the day which won’t be anything, so I need something to keep me entertained.

Your msn/contact information: alex.amayzing@hotmail.com - alex@beastly-tech.com (Add both of them since I alternate quite often when I’m trying to escape people. I’ll eventually permanently move to one, lol)[/quote]

So you are saying that you are willing to provide an IPB board for the forum?

Read full topic
